enWisdom: Truth is an incisive sword
Truth is the best way
Truth is the strongest supporter
Truth is the clearest course
One who is overcome [while he is] on the right, is victorious
Truth is a sword [to fight] against the followers of falsehood

Wisdom: الْحَقُّ أَبْلَجٌ مُنَزَّهٌ عَنِ الْمُحَابَاةِ وَالْمُرَايَاةِ
enWisdom: The truth is illuminated and free from prejudice and hypocrisy
Through truth, the petitioner gets support
For truth there is stability

Wisdom: خَيْرُ الْأُمُورِ مَا أَسْفَرَ عَنِ الْحَقِّ
enWisdom: The best matters are those that reveal the truth
There is no adviser more sincere than the truth
There is no companion who is dearer than the truth
One who takes the support of truth is not defeated
One who elevates himself by truth is not overtaken (or abased)

Wisdom: إِنَّ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ قَدْ أَنَارَ سَبِيلَ الْحَقِّ وَأَوْضَحَ طُرُقَهُ فَشِقْوَةٌ لَازِمَةٌ أَوْ سَعَادَةٌ دَائِمَةٌ
enWisdom: Verily Allah, the Glorified, has illuminated the path of truth and has clarified its ways, so [there is] either inescapable wretchedness or eternal felicity
There is truth and falsehood, and each has its followers

Wisdom: حَقٌّ يَضُرُّ خَيْرٌ مِنْ بَاطِلٍ يَسُرُّ
enWisdom: Truth that harms is better than falsehood that brings joy

Wisdom: عَلَيْكُمْ بِالْمَحَجَّةِ الْبَيْضَاءِ فَاسْلُكُوهَا وَإِلَّا اسْتَبْدَلَ اللَّهُ بِكُمْ غَيْرَكُمْ
enWisdom: Take to the highway of illumination [and truth] and follow it, otherwise Allah will replace you with others
The goal of one who is on the right is [following or remaining on] the right course
Indeed, the highway of truth has been made manifest for those who seek it

Wisdom: قَلِيلُ الْحَقِّ يَدْفَعُ كَثِيرَ الْبَاطِلِ كَمَا أَنَّ الْقَلِيلَ مِنَ النَّارِ يُحْرِقُ كَثِيرَ الْحَطَبِ
enWisdom: Little truth repels much falsehood, just as a little fire burns a lot of firewood

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يُنْجِهِ الْحَقُّ أَهْلَكَهُ الْبَاطِلُ
enWisdom: One who is not saved by the truth is destroyed by falsehood

Wisdom: مَنْ جَعَلَ الْحَقَّ مَطْلَبَهُ لَانَ لَهُ الشَّدِيدُ وَقَرُبَ عَلَيْهِ الْبَعِيدُ
enWisdom: Whoever makes the truth his goal, difficult things are made easy for him and distant things are brought nearer to him

Wisdom: مَنْ تَهَاوَنَ بِالدِّينِ هَانَ وَمَنْ غَالَبَ الْحَقَّ لَانَ
enWisdom: One who is careless in his religion becomes lowly and one who fights with the truth, is forced to yield [to it]

Wisdom: مَنْ كَانَ مَقْصَدُهُ الْحَقَّ أَدْرَكَهُ وَلَوْ كَانَ كَثِيرَ اللَّبْسِ
enWisdom: One whose goal is the truth will attain it, even if he is very uncertain
Falsehood and truth do not go together

Wisdom: لَا يُعَابُ الرَّجُلُ بِأَخْذِ حَقِّهِ وَإِنَّمَا يُعَابُ بِأَخْذِ مَا لَيْسَ لَهُ
enWisdom: A man cannot be faulted for taking his right, rather he can only be censured for taking that which is not [rightfully] his
A little truth repels much falsehood

Wisdom: لَئِنْ أُمِّرَ الْبَاطِلُ لَقَدِيماً فَعَلَ لَئِنْ قَلَّ الْحَقُّ لَرُبَّمَا وَلَعَلَّ لَقَلَّمَا أَدْبَرَ شَيْ‏ءٌ فَأَقْبَلَ
enWisdom: If falsehood dominates, it has [always] been so in the past, and if truth diminishes, that too has often occurred and may [again] happenIt is seldom that a thing lags behind and remains behind
